title: Newly Renovated Room for rent in Waterloo
description:
This well maintained main-level walk in unit features two generously sized bedrooms, a modern three piece bathroom, and a welcoming kitchen. One room is still available to rent and it is suitable for one individual. The home is smoke free and pet free. The unit includes convenient amenities such as shared laundry and central air conditioning, dishwasher, and water softener. For your ease the quoted rent includes WI-FI, and all utilities. Residents will love the close proximity to a wide range of amenities, including shopping centres, restaurants, Wilfrid Laurier University, The University of Waterloo, Conestoga's Waterloo campus, St.Jacobs Farmers Market, and easy access to Highway 85. Combining comfort with prime location, this home offers an exceptional lifestyle.


Please be prepared to provide the following:

1. About yourself.

2. About your job.

3. Your credit score.

4. When you are looking to move in and why you are moving.

5. Anything else you may want to share that would make you an ideal tenant.


Please contact: izzychesterfield@gmail.com

title: Private room available January 5, 2025 - FEMALES ONLY
description:
Private room available for rent in a 5-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom townhouse. The townhouse is currently occupied by four females and well maintained.


The townhouse is a 12-minute walk from Laurier University, and a 2-minute walk from Conestoga College. Bedroom is furnished with a bed, mattress, desk, chair and dresser. The bedroom has large windows with tons of sunlight. Washroom is shared with one other female. Common kitchen is fully furnished with a stove, microwave, air fryer, fridge and dishwasher. Laundry and recreation room are situated in the basement. All bedrooms in the townhouse are equipped with a lock and separate key.


Rent is $900 per month including utilities. Parking spot is available at an additional charge. Lease term is 8 months or longer (January to August 2025 or longer).


Free wifi. On-site laundry at no additional charge.

title: University room for rent January to May
description:
-Located just a 20 second walk from Laurier campus. Also 17 minute walk to University of Waterloo and 15 minute walk to Conestoga waterloo campus.

-large basement room with window.

-bathroom in basement shared with one other person.

-large kitchen and living room shared among other roommates.

-flexible with move in time.

-bedroom unfurnished, common areas fully furnished including kitchen appliances.
